features: 🎀1 2 Year Old Girl Gifts: Not only a nice holiday gift, birthday gift, Christmas gift, Valentines Day gifts, visit gift for little girls, but a relatively inexpensive way to give your child endless hours of artistic and educational opportunities. Use magnetic drawing boards for math, number recognition, learning shapes, even does their homework.

🎨Red/Blue/Green/Yellow Colors Zones: Magnetic doodle board for toddlers 1-3 displays 4 different colors that make child’s drawing more vivid. With 8.7" doodle pad, the toys for girls can be used repeatedly. Your one year old girl can easily pull the slide back and forth, then it will be clean immediately.

💪Safety&Stronh Bearing: Toddler drawing board is made of high quality non-toxic and tasteless ABS material, and has passed the safety test for baby toys over 12 months, bringing your girls a safe and happy childhood. Up to 120lbs. No need to worry about shaking or breaking.

🖍️Smoothly Design&No Choking: There is no choking small parts in the package for 18month+ year old girl. Flowing edge design to avoid 1 year old girl's hand injury. The design of the pen and the rope is integrated, no need to worry about the sudden loss of the pen. Enough rope length to allow either the right or left hand to draw freely.

🎁Convenient Toddler Travel Toys: The 4 legs of drawing table can be detachable and changed the format for 3 ways. Let children draw more freely and comfortably. The design of the handle belt is convenient to carry on car, train, boat, and plane journeys. 1 2 3 year old girls won’t create a mess on grandma’s carpet the way paints might.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A Relatively Inexpensive Way to Give Your Child Artistic Opportunities One of the most important factors in developing imaginative thinking is play time. And magnetic boards are the kind of toys that encourage children to use their creativity and imagination while playing. With magnetic boards, especially it with a pen, are a good way to encourage children to use their hands to create something amazing and cool. Whenever a child uses her hands and fingers to play, she is practicing and refining her fine motor skills and hand eye coordination.When children play with magnetic boards, they will be able to engage in imaginative play and pretend play. And as they play, they can experience different emotions and will have a chance to see things in different perspectives. Being able to tell stories also helps build a child’s confidence and self-esteem.

Safe Material Made Toddler drawing board for kids is made of high quality non-toxic and tasteless ABS material, and has passed the safety test for baby toys over 12 months. Avoid Choking Risk There is no choking small parts in the package for 18month+ year old girl. Flowing edge design to avoid 12 month year old girl's hand injury. 9.8" Larger Doodle Pad It provided children with wider and larger space painting, stimulating more creativity and imagination.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and writes in color!
reviews.reviewText: My toddlers love this! It keeps them entertained for awhile and they love drawing shapes. It’s sturdy and won’t loose the “pen” because it’s securely attached!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 2 year old Birthday gift
reviews.reviewText: This little desk is sturdy and was the perfect Birthday gift for my inquisitive 2 year old great-grandson. He loves it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Toddler magnetic drawing board
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful toy for my little two year old grand! Sturdy & safe. Really nicely constructed. Easy put together legs to drawing board. Love that you can use with 4 legs, two legs, or none at all!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I thought this would be a little bit bigger but my 1.5 yo still loves it. I like that it has the option to keep the legs on or you can carry it with a little strap! Very fun

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 18 month old is hard on toys, he throws and beats all this toys on the ground. This thing can definitely hold up to the abuse he puts it through and he loves it! He’s been absolutely in love with it since it came in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter is 16 months old and she loves this. It looks pretty sturdy and was a great value for the money. The only thing that would make it better would be that the string could be longer. It’s too short to give her good flexibility. All in all this is a great way for little ones to learn to color with no mess.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy assembly. Perfect size. Love the string that keeps the pen attached

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The function of the product is not so good
reviews.reviewText: When the product was initially delivered to our house, I noticed that the erasing button on the magnetic drawing board was too tight for my grandson to move. In accordance with the Amazon return policy, I returned the product to the seller. However, the seller replaced it with another one without seeking my permission. Furthermore, I observed that the cost of the replaced product this time amounted to 0, even though I identified some issues with it. It means that I am unable to be refunded if I return this product to the seller.
Sehr gute Hilfe bei der kreativen Entwicklung der Kinder

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a lovely little drawing board, it’s small and compact but the perfect size for my 18 month old. He loves it, loves drawing on it and using it as a little table. It can be a bit hazardous when kids this age pick things up and leave them lying around face down - my son has tripped and fallen on it with the legs facing up a couple of times so extra care is needed when playing with it. I’ve taken the legs off now because it isn’t safe for children to be left with it if your eye isn’t in them all the time. I turn around for a split second to grab a nappy and that’s all it takes. The string for the pen is frustratingly short as well and it does get my little one upset that he can’t hold the pen comfortably at the opposite end of the board. I suppose you could either cut it off or extend the string slightly but otherwise it’s a lovely little gift.

Ich habe diese Magische Tafel für meine Enkeltochter gekauft und es war die richtige Entscheidung.Die kleine ist immer wieder gerne mit dieser Tafel am Malen und dabei ist die kleine erst 11/2 Jahre.Man kann die Tafel überall mitnehmen und braucht keine Malbücher und Stifte einpacken.Deshalb finde ich, das so eine magische Tafel auch für unterwegs sehr praktisch ist.Von mir gibt es Deshalb eine ganz klare weiter Empfehlung.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size- just as described fast delivery

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my 12month old grandaughter. Great for her motor skills, great that it detatches from the legs so she can hold it, easy for her to hold the pen. She doesnt leave it alone. Its a fantastic way for her to engage with something thats not electronic😊
